extension.news: Fix transcode failures on some platforms Use Kodi time format setting Restore last window when starting the add-on while it is running Add Portuguese (Brazil), Italian, Polish translations Add ability to exit search edit box with previous menu button Only play unwatched media on play/shuffle when filtering for unwatched Fix duplicated icons when fast-scrolling a hub Fixed GUI not responding after public IP renewal Advanced settings: - Automatically seek selected position after a delay - Use skip step settings from Kodi for timeline OSD-Autohide improvements Show post play on user stop when item considered played Use Unplayed/Played instead of Unwatched/Watched Fix cast popup displaying partially offscreen Various fixes for incorrectly transcoded playback Support new subtitles menu in playback for Leia Make sure progress bar is visible on items with less than 2% watched Fix focus issues caused when hubs disappear Fix flattened seasons issues Allow Kodi info display to be visible on info button Fixes hubs not updating and some crashes More fixes for Kodi 18, ex. missing letters list Fix resume behavior with DSPlayer Fix to allow 3D mode selection Add advanced option to skip the header when going back Ensure paused state is kept after seeking or changing video settings Allow closing of the options header in scrolled views using context menu button Some direct playback and resume fixes Shutdown fixes Show play state on related items in preplays + On Deck in postplay
